doc.title: Panoramic View of New Haven, Conn.
doc.plot: This picture was taken at New Haven during the Bi-Centennial week. A most excellent picture of the streets of New Haven, Conn., from the front of a trolley car. It shows the elaborate decorations of New Haven for this memorable occasion. Besides being a perfect panoramic view, it gives the audience an excellent idea of the streets of New Haven. The strip ends by showing the college grounds and the entrance to Yale College. Enormous crowds of people are seen carrying flags and banners and parading the streets.
